description:
The Inter-High has finally begun. Yokohama Minato makes steady progress and advances to the semifinals. Ryo nearly breaks under the pressure, but he overcomes it with help from his friends. Then the semifinals begin. Their opponent is Hirayama. Misaki is eager to play against Yusa in order to conquer his past trauma, but he doesn`t get his wish and is instead matched up against Ryo. Ryo faces Misaki`s resolve and passion and meets them with all his heart and soul!!
Source: crunchyroll
